pain_points.description: Drivers leave before updated manifests are printed due to route changes.
pain_points.source_quote: Pain: paper manifests printed daily; route changes require reprint and drivers sometimes leave before updates.

pain_points.description: Manual handling of paper manifests leads to errors and lacks a digital audit trail.
pain_points.source_quote: Pain: paper manifests printed daily... digital audit trail.

stakeholder_needs.need: Transition from paper to digital manifests with live updates and a digital audit trail for compliance.
Implement dynamic manifest refresh to support real-time updates in the mobile app, including offline support.
Reduce paper-based errors through real-time updates.

key_constraints: Must-have: Compliance with digital records for auditors
Should-have: WebSocket or push channel for manifest stream
recommended_next_steps: Investigate implementing WebSocket or another push channel for real-time updates to the mobile app.
Develop a solution for dynamic manifest refresh to support live updates when routes change.
Evaluate the feasibility of creating a polling mechanism or adapter to handle legacy routing service updates.
Assess and prototype solutions for offline capabilities to ensure full access for drivers without connection.
